about.title: Who am I?
about.introduction: Hello! My name is Almeida Neo, and I am 21 years old. I enjoy working on personal projects during my free time, which you can find in the <projects>projects</projects> section of this website.
about.employmentSeeking: At present, I am actively seeking permanent employment opportunities. Please feel free to contact me !
about.additionalInfo: You may want more informations about me .. ?

footer.text: This website was built by Almeida Neo using NextJS. Thank you for taking the time to read through it, and I hope you found it enjoyable.
